title: Advanced Language Leadership and Communication Competency Strengthening Program Through Online Experiential Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced language proficiency (reading, writing, listening, speaking) and management/leadership experience, with basic communication skills in multicultural settings
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen communication and leadership in multicultural corporate environments. Blended learning combining personal device-based online activities (video conferencing, collaboration tools) and face-to-face workshops. Operates a customized feedback system to improve learners' expression, comprehension, and cultural sensitivity

learning_goals: Learners design problem-solving strategies with over 80% accuracy in practical language contexts (business meetings, customer consultations) using experiential learning models and apply context-appropriate vocabulary and grammatical structures.

Learners successfully complete three or more language-based leadership simulation tasks using online collaboration tools (video conferencing, real-time document sharing) and apply communication strategies considering team members' speaking and listening abilities.

Learners write reflective learning journals twice monthly, analyze three language use patterns (vocabulary, grammar, pronunciation, intonation) in experiential learning contexts (e.g., business meetings, customer consultations), and establish two improvement plans (e.g., acquiring technical terms, enhancing non-verbal communication) to achieve an 80%+ implementation rate in the following month's evaluation.

resources: Real-Time Video Collaboration Tools (Zoom, Microsoft Teams)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
